name: Novisign
overview:
NoviSign Provides easy to use dynamic Digital Signage SaaS platform, supporting PC and android based devices as Digital Signage Players.

As we have just recently released a new version with several advanced features (Like: RSS feed, Embedded YouTube, Rolling Text, and many more), I urge you to try out the new Software, in particular the new option in the Play List Tab, the “Compose” Option.

Sign in/Sign Up directly from http://www.novisign.com/.

NoviSign Software short guides: Basic Signage:http://www.novisign.com/digital-signage-software.htm Advanced Editing Capabilities: http://www.novisign.com/digital-signage-editor.htm

Downloads: To Download Win and Android Players: http://www.novisign.com/novi-sign-support.htm To learn more about the list of ‘NoviSign certified’ Android devices, please use the following link: http://www.novisign.com/Android-TV-box.htm. Should you try on one of these devices, or others and the System works/fails, please let us know. In order to understand, how you can reduce costs by Using Android Based Devices, see this page: http://www.novisign.com/Android-based-digital-signage.htm

Pricing: And Finally, our pricing page: http://www.novisign.com/signage-pricing.htm

Additions: Example of Editor capabilities (done by me with very limited understanding in ‘design’), Click on this link:http://app.novisign.com/Player/NPlayer.html?screenkey=20a57b1b-2b17-4b6f-9ea8-afe50baa3e0c# or paste this key into one of the players:20a57b1b-2b17-4b6f-9ea8-afe50baa3e0c
